written abbreviation for
non-binary : having a gender identity that is not simply male or female: My old job was just posted, and I'd encourage any female/queer/NB people to apply. I'm Jan: 24, nb, Latinx. Happy to be in the chat. Synonyms
enby informal
non-binary
written abbreviation for the Canadian province of New Brunswick: used in addresses: The charges against the Woodstock, NB men were dropped in court. The Fundy Fringe Festival will be held in Saint John, NB.

written abbreviation used before a piece of important information to make certain that readers notice it: NB All prices are quoted for a low-season week starting January 6/7.
